title: Mid 1990's cursive
content:
Hello All,

Could anyone help my ID this type? It's an old logo from a Japanese (I believe) company that made after market parts for the Toyota MR-2. And possibly other cars.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015045802im_/http:/typophile.com/files/iMec_4585.jpg)

Your help is much appreciated!
author: crmoberg

comments.content: The /mec appears to be Brush Script; the /I may be custom...
